steps.name: Environment Check - Virtual Environment
steps.stderr:
bash: .venv/bin/python: No such file or directory
Virtual environment Python not executable: /workspace/.venv/bin/python
Virtual environment appears to be broken

Remediation options:
  1. Run with --auto-repair flag: ./devtools/run_all_checks.sh --auto-repair
  2. Set environment variable: AUTO_REPAIR_VENV=1 ./devtools/run_all_checks.sh
  3. Manually recreate: rm -rf .venv && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
